title: Level 9 in game hoping this updates my level on the Message Boards
body: Just testing this out and hoping that I can now reply to posts in the Message Boards. Through some googling efforts, I found that upvoting a comment would allow me to create a post and that a thread of my own should sync the levels from the client to the boards. (fingers crossed)

replies.body: Yeah, an account may need to sync up with the boards when posting for the first time.  It looks like you're all set now!  Let me know if you have any posting issues!
